sentences.english: The Monkey King is from a 16th Century fantasy epic by Wu Cheng En.
sentences.chinese: 猴王是16世纪吴承恩写的一部神话传奇。

definition: Xu Zhonglin or Chen Zhonglin 陳仲琳|陈仲琳 (c. 1567-c. 1620), Ming novelist, to whom the fantasy novel Investure of the Gods 封神演義|封神演义 is attributed, together with Lu Xixing 陸西星|陆西星
